snippet.title: Silver Screen DLC - The Typing of The Dead: Overkill with voice recognition, Part 6
snippet.description:
Dictating lines from movies and names of actors to destroy zombies.

The Typing Of The Dead: Overkill:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/246580/
Silver Screen DLC:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/282520/
Using Dragon NaturallySpeaking v11.


AutoHotKey:
http://www.autohotkey.com/

My AutoHotKey code:

;Ctrl-Alt-h activates the Tab key pressing
^!h::
Loop
{
Send {Tab}
sleep 500
 
if GetKeyState("Shift", "P") ; Looks to see if Shift is pressed
break  ; exits Loop if so
}
